verses.roman:
sei dina tāṅra ghare rahi' bhikṣā kari'
tāṅre kṛpā kari' āge calilā gaurahari

synonyms: sei dina—on that day; tāṅra ghare—the house of that brāhmaṇa; rahi'-staying; bhikṣā kari'-accepting prasāda; tāṅre—unto him; kṛpā kari'-showing mercy; āge—ahead; calilā—departed; gaura-hari—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: That day, Lord Caitanya remained there and accepted prasāda at his house. After bestowing mercy upon him in this way, the Lord proceeded ahead.
